name: Skylight (itch) (Ireh Choe)
description:
Skylight : Virtual reality game

Skylight is a virtual reality game which is aimed to be run by desktop Oculus VR supports, including HTC Vive, Oculus Rift 1&S, Quest 1&2 with Oculus link and air link services. The game is single-player supported. It requires more than 1.5m x 2.0m of a play area. Both left and right motion controller are must needed. You can select menu bars with a trigger button of the right hand controller.

Once played, an illuminating magpie breaks out of a cage.  You have to guide the little one with your right hand controller, avoiding obstacles of various spaces to reach the place of the light. A panel on the left hand controller indicates life points left, scores and bonus multiplier according to a difficulty of the current game.

The game play is simply like flying a paper plane. For efficiently playing the game, we strongly recommend you to move your entire body to avoid objects, not only by moving an arm.
